refnamediv.refpurpose: A mechanism to wrap opaque C structures registered by the type system

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: GBoxed is a generic wrapper mechanism for arbitrary C structures. The only thing the type system needs to know about the structures is how to copy and free them, beyond that they are treated as opaque chunks of memory.
Boxed types are useful for simple value-holder structures like rectangles or points. They can also be used for wrapping structures defined in non-GObject based libraries.

refsect2.title: GBoxedCopyFunc ()
refsect2.para: This function is provided by the user and should produce a copy of the passed in boxed structure.

listitem.simpara: The boxed structure to be copied.
The newly created copy of the boxed structure.

refsect2.title: GBoxedFreeFunc ()
refsect2.para: This function is provided by the user and should free the boxed structure passed.

listitem.simpara: The boxed structure to be freed.

refsect2.title: g_boxed_copy ()
refsect2.para: Provide a copy of a boxed structure src_boxed which is of type boxed_type.

listitem.simpara: The boxed structure to be copied.
The newly created copy of the boxed structure.

refsect2.title: g_boxed_free ()
refsect2.para: Free the boxed structure boxed which is of type boxed_type.

listitem.simpara: The boxed structure to be freed.

refsect2.title: g_boxed_type_register_static ()
refsect2.para: This function creates a new G_TYPE_BOXED derived type id for a new boxed type with name name. Boxed type handling functions have to be provided to copy and free opaque boxed structures of this type.

listitem.simpara: Name of the new boxed type.
New G_TYPE_BOXED derived type id for name.

refsect2.title: g_pointer_type_register_static ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new G_TYPE_POINTER derived type id for a new pointer type with name name.

listitem.simpara: the name of the new pointer type.
a new G_TYPE_POINTER derived type id for name.

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_HASH_TABLE
refsect2.para: The GType for a boxed type holding a GHashTable reference.

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_STRV
refsect2.para: The GType for a boxed type holding a NULL-terminated array of strings.
The code fragments in the following example show the use of a property of type G_TYPE_STRV with g_object_class_install_property(), g_object_set() and g_object_get().

refsect2.title: G_TYPE_REGEX
refsect2.para: The GType for a boxed type holding a GRegex reference.

refsect2.title: GStrv
refsect2.para: A C representable type name for G_TYPE_STRV.
